PIC32CX-BZ Zigbee API Reference
Functions
I2C
HAL functions

Functions used to send and receive data over I2C interface. More...

Functions

int HAL_OpenI2cPacket (HAL_I2cDescriptor_t *descriptor)
 Opens TWI resource. Clock rate and tty must be configured.
.
int HAL_CloseI2cPacket (HAL_I2cDescriptor_t *descriptor)
 Closes the TWI resource.
int HAL_WriteI2cPacket (HAL_I2cDescriptor_t *descriptor)
 Writes a series of bytes out to the TWI bus. Operation result will be sent to the callback function specified int the HAL_I2cDescriptor_t instance.
int HAL_ReadI2cPacket (HAL_I2cDescriptor_t *descriptor)
 Reads the series of bytes from the TWI bus. Operation result will be sent to the callback function specified int the HAL_I2cDescriptor_t instance.

Detailed Description

Functions used to send and receive data over I2C interface.

Function Documentation

int HAL_OpenI2cPacket ( HAL_I2cDescriptor_t *  descriptor)

Opens TWI resource. Clock rate and tty must be configured.
.

Parameters:
[in]descriptor- pointer to an instance of HAL_I2cDescriptor_t type
Returns:
-1 - the resource is already opened or the pointer is NULL
0 - success
int HAL_CloseI2cPacket ( HAL_I2cDescriptor_t *  descriptor)

Closes the TWI resource.

Parameters:
[in]descriptor- pointer to an instance of HAL_I2cDescriptor_t type
Returns:
-1 - resource has not been opened
0 - success
int HAL_WriteI2cPacket ( HAL_I2cDescriptor_t *  descriptor)

Writes a series of bytes out to the TWI bus. Operation result will be sent to the callback function specified int the HAL_I2cDescriptor_t instance.

Parameters:
[in]descriptor- pointer to an instance of HAL_I2cDescriptor_t type
Returns:
0 - the request has been accepted and the bus is free
-1 - otherwise
int HAL_ReadI2cPacket ( HAL_I2cDescriptor_t *  descriptor)

Reads the series of bytes from the TWI bus. Operation result will be sent to the callback function specified int the HAL_I2cDescriptor_t instance.

Parameters:
[in]descriptor- pointer to an instance of HAL_I2cDescriptor_t type
Returns:
0 - the request has been accepted and the bus is free
-1 - otherwise
